message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.Distributed, cs.SY, cs.PL 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - This paper discusses distributed fault tolerance schemes, which falls under the purview of this sub-category. 
2. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper discusses safety and liveness violations in fault tolerance schemes, which is a security concern. 
3. cs.Distributed - This sub-category deals with distributed systems, which is the focus of this paper. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes fixes to existing systems, which falls under the purview of this sub-category. 
5. cs.PL (Programming Languages) - The paper discusses the implementation of fault tolerance schemes, which could fall under this sub-category.
